title: Diamond and Pearl Hasli Necklace - "Rathna Haaralu"
materials: Emerald. Crafted with meticulous Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Intricately designed floral motifs encrusted with sparkling diamonds. The central pendant features a ruby and emerald in a classic South Indian flower design, surrounded by diamond lattice work. Dainty pearl drops add a touch of elegance. The necklace's structure is a woven gold chain supporting these floral elements.
occasions: and other special occasions. A stunning choice for brides (వధువు) or for a celebratory Seemantham function (సీమంతం). Suitable for modern cocktail parties or formal gatherings.
description: This exquisite Hasli combines the timeless appeal of South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and lustrous pearls offer unparalleled brilliance. The intricate craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish ensures heirloom quality and lasting value. A symbol of prosperity and grace, perfect for celebrating life's precious moments.
